Question: What does aanleggen mean in Dutch?
Options: Lay on;to lay out;to walk;to recommend
Explanation: Aanleggen means to lay on or moor.

Question: De boot gaat _____ aan de kade.
Explanation: The boat is going to moor at the quay.

Question: What does aanlopen mean?
Options: Drop in;to lay out;to recommend;to spend
Explanation: Aanlopen means to drop in or walk up to something or someone.

Question: Translate I drop in at the house
Explanation: You drop in at the house.

Question: What does aanraden mean?
Explanation: Aanraden means to recommend or suggest something.

Question: What does Balen mean?
Options: Annoyed / Disappointed;to be limited;to realize;to spend
Explanation: Balen means to be annoyed or disappointed about something.

Question: Translate I am annoyed about the weather
What does beseffen mean?
Options: Realize/Be aware of;to be annoyed;to be limited;to spend
Explanation: Beseffen means to realize or become aware of something.

Question: What does besteden mean?
Options: Spend;to be annoyed;to be limited;to realize
Explanation: Besteden means to spend time or money on something.

Question: Ik _____ veel tijd aan werk.
Explanation: I spend a lot of time on work.

Question: What does bevalt me mean?
Correct Answer: I like it / it pleases me
Options: I like it / it pleases me;I confirm it;I realize it;I spend it
Explanation: Bevalt me means I like it or it pleases me.

Question: What does bevestigen mean?
Explanation: Bevestigen means to confirm or verify something.

Question: What does opgelucht mean?
Explanation: Opgelucht means relieved or feeling better after a worry.

Question: Ik ben _____ door het nieuws.
Explanation: I am surprised by the news.

Question: What does biljet mean?
Explanation: Biljet means a ticket or banknote.

Question: What does Rood Staan mean?
Options: to be overdrawn;positive balance;high interest;low balance
Explanation: Rood Staan means to be overdrawn (negative balance).

Question: What does schuldig mean?
Explanation: Schuldig means guilty or to owe money.

Question: What does vaste lasten mean?
Explanation: Vaste lasten means fixed costs (regular expenses).

Question: What does kinderbijslag mean?
Options: Child benefit / allowance;child care;family allowance;tax credit

Question: Translate The day care is expensive
What does toeslag mean?
Explanation: Toeslag means allowance or supplement (extra payment).

Question: What does Verlof mean?
Explanation: Verlof means leave or vacation time.

Question: What does Verlof mean?
Explanation: Verlof means leave or vacation time.

Question: What does dwingen mean?
Explanation: Dwingen means to force or compel someone.

Question: What does eisen mean?
Explanation: Eisen means to demand or require something.

Question: What does hovenier mean?
Explanation: Hovenier means gardener (person who works with gardens).

Question: What does inzamelen mean?
Explanation: Inzamelen means to collect or gather (often money).

Question: Wij _____ geld voor een goed doel.
Explanation: We collect money for a good cause.

Question: What does noteren mean?
Explanation: Noteren means to write down or note down.

Question: Ik _____ geld naar je rekening.
Explanation: I transfer money to your account.

Question: What does trakteren mean?
Explanation: Trakteren means to treat (pay for someone).

Question: What does uitzoeken mean?
Options: to figure out;to work;to collect;to spend
Explanation: Uitzoeken means to figure out or investigate.

Question: What does werkzaamheden mean?
Explanation: Werkzaamheden means activities or work tasks.

Question: Translate The work activities are finished
What does daarnaast mean?
Explanation: Daarnaast means in addition or besides.

Question: What does eenmalig mean?
Explanation: Eenmalig means one time or single occurrence.

Question: Translate I usually go to bed early
Correct Answer: ik ga gewoonlijk vroeg naar bed
Explanation: I usually go to bed early.

Question: What does goedkomen mean?
Options: It will be fine;to come;to arrive;to leave
Explanation: Goedkomen means it will be fine or work out well.

Question: What does hartstikke mean?
Explanation: Hartstikke means very / really / or extremely.

Question: What does inmiddels mean?
Explanation: Inmiddels means in the meantime or by now.

Question: Translate In the meantime it is ready
Explanation: In the meantime it is ready.

Question: What does kritiek mean?
Explanation: Kritiek means criticism or critical feedback.

Question: What does kwijtraken mean?
Correct Answer: Get rid of / to lose something
Options: Get rid of / to lose something;to find;to keep;to save
Explanation: Kwijtraken means to get rid of or lose something.

Question: What does lasten mean?
Explanation: Lasten means burdens or costs (financial pressure).

Question: What does namens mean?
Explanation: Namens means on behalf of or representing someone.

Question: Ik spreek _____ de groep.
Explanation: I speak on behalf of the group.

Question: What does overhouden mean?
Explanation: Overhouden means to have left over or remain.

Question: What does overvallen mean?
Options: Rob/Take by surprise;to visit;to help;to call
Explanation: Overvallen means to rob or take by surprise.

Question: What does pech mean?
Explanation: Pech means bad luck or misfortune.

Question: What does tegenwoordig mean?
Explanation: Tegenwoordig means nowadays or these days.

Question: Translate Nowadays I work from home
What does verlopen mean?
Explanation: Verlopen means to expire or run out.

Question: What does zich mean?
Explanation: Zich means oneself or reflexive pronoun.

Question: What does bovendien mean?
Explanation: Used to add additional information to what was already said

Question: Translate: Bovendien is het een goede kwaliteit.
Correct Answer: Moreover it is a good quality|Besides it is a good quality|Additionally it is a good quality|However it is a good quality
Options: Moreover it is a good quality|Besides it is a good quality|Additionally it is a good quality|However it is a good quality

Question: Ik heb _____ al gewaarschuwd.
Explanation: Used to indicate something happened before a specific event

Question: What does fysiek mean?
Explanation: Related to the body or physical activity

Question: Translate: Het is een fysiek zware baan.
Correct Answer: It is a physically heavy job|It is a mentally heavy job|It is an emotionally heavy job|It is a spiritually heavy job
Options: It is a physically heavy job|It is a mentally heavy job|It is an emotionally heavy job|It is a spiritually heavy job

Question: Zijn _____ past goed bij het team.
Explanation: Refers to someone's individual character traits

Question: Translate: Ze is erg stressbestendig in moeilijke situaties.
Correct Answer: She is very stress resistant in difficult situations|She is very stressed in difficult situations|She is very stressful in difficult situations|She is very stress free in difficult situations
Options: She is very stress resistant in difficult situations|She is very stressed in difficult situations|She is very stressful in difficult situations|She is very stress free in difficult situations

Question: Translate: De nieuwe vestiging opent volgende week.
Correct Answer: The new branch opens next week|The new building opens next week|The new office opens next week|The new company opens next week
Options: The new branch opens next week|The new building opens next week|The new office opens next week|The new company opens next week

Question: What does flexibel mean?
Explanation: Able to adapt or change easily

Question: Translate: De kandidaten zijn erg gemotiveerd.
Correct Answer: The candidates are very motivated|The candidates are very demotivated|The candidates are very uninterested|The candidates are very lazy
Options: The candidates are very motivated|The candidates are very demotivated|The candidates are very uninterested|The candidates are very lazy

Question: What does kandidaat mean?
Explanation: A person applying for a position

Question: Er zijn veel _____ voor deze functie.
What does kwaliteit mean?
Explanation: The standard or level of excellence

Question: Translate: De kwaliteit van het werk is uitstekend.
Correct Answer: The quality of the work is excellent|The quantity of the work is excellent|The price of the work is excellent|The value of the work is excellent
Options: The quality of the work is excellent|The quantity of the work is excellent|The price of the work is excellent|The value of the work is excellent
Explanation: Refers to the standard of something

Question: Translate: Ik probeer hem te overtuigen om te komen.
Correct Answer: I try to convince him to come|I try to persuade him to come|I try to argue him to come|I try to discuss him to come
Options: I try to convince him to come|I try to persuade him to come|I try to argue him to come|I try to discuss him to come
Explanation: To persuade someone to do something

Question: Translate: Het is een praktische oplossing.
Correct Answer: It is a practical solution|It is a theoretical solution|It is an ideal solution|It is a perfect solution
Options: It is a practical solution|It is a theoretical solution|It is an ideal solution|It is a perfect solution
Explanation: Describes something that is useful and realistic

Question: What does toevoegen mean?
Explanation: To add something to existing content

Question: Ik ga wat informatie _____ aan het rapport.
Translate: Ze heeft een uitstekende prestatie geleverd.
Correct Answer: She has delivered an excellent performance|She has delivered a good performance|She has delivered an average performance|She has delivered a poor performance
Options: She has delivered an excellent performance|She has delivered a good performance|She has delivered an average performance|She has delivered a poor performance
Explanation: Describes something of very high quality

Question: What does voorkomen mean?
Correct Answer: to prevent / to occur|to happen|to stop|to start
Options: to prevent / to occur|to happen|to stop|to start
Explanation: Can mean both prevent and occur depending on context

Question: What does zo'n mean?
Explanation: Means such a or such an

Question: Translate: Zij is zo'n gemotiveerde werknemer.
Correct Answer: She is such a motivated employee|She is so much motivated employee|She is so many motivated employee|She is so little motivated employee
Options: She is such a motivated employee|She is so much motivated employee|She is so many motivated employee|She is so little motivated employee
